title: Wall Hook
summary: Rounded wall hook with mounting plate and countersunk screw holes.

parameters.base_width: Width of the rectangular wall plate.
parameters.base_thickness: Thickness of the wall plate and hook arm.
parameters.hook_radius: Radius of the curved hook end.
parameters.hook_thickness: Cross-sectional thickness of the hook arm.
parameters.screw_hole_diameter: Diameter of the through holes for mounting screws.

notes: Combines hull operations to blend a curved hook into a mounting plate.
